thread.title: United Tightens Travel Rules for Emotional-Support Animals

author: Doug Cameron
title: United Tightens Travel Rules for Emotional-Support Animals

organizations.name: united tightens travel rules for emotional-support animals united airlines

text:
United Airlines is tightening its requirements for passengers flying with emotional support animals following a surge in numbers and onboard incidents across the industry.
The move, announced Thursday, mirrors steps taken by Delta Air Lines Inc. last month. Other carriers are reviewing their policies after an effort by the Transportation Department to create new industrywide rules stalled last year.
